Class TagsAdapter

com.example.cmput301groupproject.TagsAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class TagsAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<String>
Custom ArrayAdapter for managing and displaying tags with checkboxes.
